rules.name: Combat Doctrines
rules.lore: The Codex Stellar has proven its worth as a superb treatise on warfare over countless battlefields, and has remained so even after ten thousand years. Many Star Marines hold its wisdom in awe, and exemplify its teachings, employing a flexible set of combat doctrines to eliminate their enemy. Few opponents can withstand the fury of such an onslaught.
rules.text: At the start of the Battle Round, you can select one of the Combat Doctrines listed below. Until the end of the Battle Round, that Combat Doctrine is active and its effects apply to all +Star Marines+ units from your army. You can only select each Combat Doctrine once per battle.

options.name: Devastator Doctrine
options.lore: The Codex Stellar explains in detail the strategic value of overwhelming firepower applied to key targets while advancing into position in order to eliminate threats and create tactical openings.
options.text: Your Units may Move, Advance and Shoot in a single Activation.

options.name: Tactical Doctrine
options.lore: As the warring armies close upon one another and vicious fire-fights erupt, the Codex lays out strategies for swiftly seizing the initiative and combining versatility with firepower.
options.text: Your Units may Fight and then Move an extra d6 inches.

options.name: Assault Doctrine
options.lore: The Codex Stellar leaves no doubt that the killing blow in most engagements must be delivered with a decisive close-quarters strike. It presents plentiful tactical means to achieve this end.
options.text: Your Units may Move, Advance and Charge in a single Activation.
